backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing question management, full syllabus and chapter-wise test creation, test attempts, leaderboard, user profiles, and access control with blob storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old Question type with required Text explanation to new Question type with optional ?Text explanation field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features for making question explanations optional across AdminQuestionCreate form, ResultPage/TestInterface display, and PDF export utility.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities with details about their functionality and recent changes to handle optional explanations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for Concept Delta navy blue branding.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description, and title for Concept Delta MHT-CET mock test platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, TanStack Router, ThemeProvider, and Toaster for the application.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links, YouTube channel, social handle, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component rendering Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer for consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, responsive mobile menu, and Internet Identity login/logout functionality with dashboard and admin links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Provides React Query mutations for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Exports mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, invalidating related queries after successful operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider using @dfinity/auth-client, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, test attempts, and leaderboard data from the backend actor.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with text/image content, multiple-choice options, correct answer, explanation, subject, and class level.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutations for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with form inputs for test metadata, question selection via checkboxes, and submission handling with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying analytics cards (users, tests, questions), tabs for test management (full syllabus and chapter-wise tests), question gallery, and user management. Uses Internet Identity authentication and queries for test data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests by selecting questions from two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths). Handles test creation, question assignment, and redirects to admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin page for creating questions with text/image content, four options (each with text/image), correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level. Handles image uploads via base64 encoding and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero banner, feature cards, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community link. Includes authentication flow via Internet Identity and navigation to dashboard for logged-in users.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results in a leaderboard with rank, username, score, and time taken. Shows medal icons for top 3 positions with gradient backgrounds and requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Displays test results with detailed statistics, performance metrics, and question-by-question breakdown. Supports PDF export of results and handles both full-syllabus and chapter-wise test types.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student landing page showing available full-syllabus and chapter-wise tests with filtering by class and subject. Handles test initiation and navigation to test interface.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Main test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection, and section management. Handles auto-submission on timeout and transitions between test sections.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, including routes for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates HTML-based PDF reports of test results with detailed statistics, performance indicators, and question-by-question analysis. Opens rendered HTML in new window for printing/saving.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for sidebar/chart/card components, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, tracking architectural decisions (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), feature implementations (branding changes, hero images, landing page updates), and known issues around image storage and mobile responsiveness.
